statements.select: select (select cast(count(*) as bit) from Oca_ServiceFamilyResponse where CallServiceId = w1.CallServiceId ) as ResponseFlag, (select OldManName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo where OldManId = w1.OldManId ) as OldManName, w1.CallServiceId,w1.CheckInTime,w1.AreaId,w1.Content,w1.LongitudeS,w1.LatitudeS,w1.DoStatus,w1.DoResults,w1.OldManId from Oca_CallService w1 inner join (select top $PageTo$ row_number() over(Order By x1.CheckInTime desc)n,x1.id from Oca_CallService x1 inner join Oca_OldManFamilyInfo x2 on x1.OldManId=x2.OldManId where FamilyMemberId=#FamilyMemberId# and DoStatus>0 and ServiceQueueId in (select distinct GroupId from Pub_Group where GroupType='10000' and Status=1) )w2 on w1.id=w2.id and w2.n >= $PageFrom$ order by w2.n asc
